properties.name: The siege of Numantia - 134 BC
properties.author: Haemimont Games
properties.description: The Iberians have rebelled against the Roman authority.\nTo prevent them from succeeding in their efforts to become a breakaway province Rome has sent Scipio Aemilianus to capture their stronghold Numantia and put an end to their uprising.\nThe Roman general besieges the Iberian city...
